ja.burhanrashid52.photoeditor

Interface OnPhotoEditorListener


  • public interface OnPhotoEditorListener
    Since:
    18/01/2017

    This are the callbacks when any changes happens while editing the photo to make and custimization on client side

    Author:
    Burhanuddin Rashid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAddViewListener(ViewType viewType, int numberOfAddedViews)
      This is a callback when user adds any view on the PhotoEditorView it can be brush,text or sticker i.e bitmap on parent view
      void onEditTextChangeListener(android.view.View rootView, java.lang.String text, int colorCode)
      When user long press the existing text this event will trigger implying that user want to edit the current TextView
      void onRemoveViewListener(int numberOfAddedViews)
      This is a callback when user remove any view on the PhotoEditorView it happens when usually undo and redo happens or text is removed
      void onStartViewChangeListener(ViewType viewType)
      A callback when user start dragging a view which can be any of ViewType
      void onStopViewChangeListener(ViewType viewType)
      A callback when user stop/up touching a view which can be any of ViewType

    • Method Detail

      • onEditTextChangeListener

        void onEditTextChangeListener(android.view.View rootView,
                              java.lang.String text,
                              int colorCode)
        When user long press the existing text this event will trigger implying that user want to edit the current TextView
        Parameters:
        rootView - view on which the long press occurs
        text - current text set on the view
        colorCode - current color value set on view

      • onAddViewListener

        void onAddViewListener(ViewType viewType,
                       int numberOfAddedViews)
        This is a callback when user adds any view on the PhotoEditorView it can be brush,text or sticker i.e bitmap on parent view
        Parameters:
        viewType - enum which define type of view is added
        numberOfAddedViews - number of views currently added
        See Also:
        ViewType

      • onRemoveViewListener

        void onRemoveViewListener(int numberOfAddedViews)
        This is a callback when user remove any view on the PhotoEditorView it happens when usually undo and redo happens or text is removed
        Parameters:
        numberOfAddedViews - number of views currently added

      • onStartViewChangeListener

        void onStartViewChangeListener(ViewType viewType)
        A callback when user start dragging a view which can be any of ViewType
        Parameters:
        viewType - enum which define type of view is added

      • onStopViewChangeListener

        void onStopViewChangeListener(ViewType viewType)
        A callback when user stop/up touching a view which can be any of ViewType
        Parameters:
        viewType - enum which define type of view is added
